com.sb.db.cassandra

Class CassandraHandlerDS

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sb.db.cassandra.CassandraHandlerDS

  • public class CassandraHandlerDS
extends Object
    This class is used if a datastax driver is involved. The dbproperties class is mandatory for the constructor of this class Requires: datastax driver (cassandra-java-driver-2.1.8.tar.gz)
    Author:
    bizz.sand
